text: Nyasaye shababukulilanga khubitsubo bienyu biobusilu tawe, halali alabatila khubitsubo ebia mwetsuba abia mwechomela obulayi, Kho omurungo kwe shitsubo esho, ni okhulisia Abamanani ekhumi, khubiakhulia bia mulisinjia Abandu benyu nohomba okhubafwala, nohomba okhulekha Omurumwa; Ne ulia ulanyoola ako tawe, afunge tsinyanga tsitaru. Kuno niko omurungo kwebitsubo bienyu ni mwitsuba. Ne mulinde ebitsubo bienyu. Endio nilwa Nyasaye abenoosilinjia tsinyaali tsitsie kho munyoole okhupa orio
